definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Excuse me, sir. What does this protractor read?
sentences.chinese: 抱歉先生，這個量角器是怎麼讀的？

sentences.english: The second compass measured the angle between the two spots.
sentences.chinese: 則第二支量角器可測量兩個側枝之間的夾角。

sentences.english: I then moved and rotated the second compass up to the next branch spot.
sentences.chinese: 然後我移動並旋轉第二支量角器到第二個側枝。

sentences.english: Compass, protractor, ruler, or any kind of aid.
sentences.chinese: 圓規，量角器，尺子或任何。

sentences.english: Use your protractor to construct an equilateral triangle.
sentences.chinese: 用量角器作一個等邊三角形。

sentences.english: The protractor must be placed on the pipe in the position shown below.
sentences.chinese: 量角器必須放在管道上如下圖所示的位置處。

sentences.english: A protractor with many co-centre circles.
sentences.chinese: 是一個帶有很多同心圓的量角器。

sentences.english: Protractor clicking on the link, but element is not visible?
sentences.chinese: 量角器點擊鏈接，但元素是不可見的？

sentences.english: Shown here with a wooden handle. The bevel is set from a protractor.
sentences.chinese: 這一款有一個木把手，斜角要卡在量角器上。

definition: set square (tool to measure right angles)
